songs.title: I’ll Be Around
songs.lyrics:
I'll be around
No matter how
You treat me now
I'll be around from now on

Your latest love
Can never last
And when its past
I'll be around when he's gone

Good-bye again
And if you find a love like mine
Just now and then
Oh drop a line to say you 're feeling fine

And when things go wrong
Perhaps you'll see
You're meant for me
So I'll be around when he's gone

Good-bye again
And if you find a love like mine
Just now and then
H drop a line to say your feeling fine

And when things go wrong
Perhaps you'll see
You're meant for me
So I'll be around when he's gone
